body:
You should do `gradInput_data = THTensor_(data)(gradInput)` instead so the code is more readable.

Could you assert that THTensor_(isContiguous)(gradInput) is true? The following code works under this assumption and I'm not 100% sure gradInput will always be contiguous, but I'll get back to you on that.
body_html:

body_text:
You should do gradInput_data = THTensor_(data)(gradInput) instead so the code is more readable.
Could you assert that THTensor_(isContiguous)(gradInput) is true? The following code works under this assumption and I'm not 100% sure gradInput will always be contiguous, but I'll get back to you on that.
